name: Dante's Renovation
description:
This is a story about one ordinary guy named Dante. One sunny day he decided to make a renovation in his old house, but he couldn't think of what will happen. After a lot of time, he has found that renovation is still not over and he's trapped in the infernal nightmare. And there's only one way out. 

You can start renovation - but can you finish it? Or will renovation finish YOU?

Controls M&K: 

W,A,S,D - move
Space - jump
R - restart
Mouse 1 - attack

Gamepad: 

Left Thumbstick - move
A - jump
Option button - restart level
Right trigger - attack

Team: 

Design: Taras Kovtun 

3D: Mykhailo Novoseltsev

Code: Vitalii Zavoka, Yevhen Lozko 

Music: Vlad Melnyk
